meanings.sent1: The photographers captured beautiful moments at the wedding.
meanings.sent2: Photographers use cameras to capture images.
meanings.sent3: The photographers at the zoo had a 'snap' happy day.
meanings.sent4: The photographers were like memory collectors freezing time in their lenses.
meanings.sent5: The photographers' lenses were like magical windows into the past.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the practice of photography.
meanings.sent1: Professional photographers often work on assignments for magazines.
meanings.sent2: Many photographers enjoy experimenting with different lighting techniques.
meanings.sent3: The photographers had a 'flashy' competition to see who could take the best shot.
meanings.sent4: In the world of creativity, photographers are the painters of light.
meanings.sent5: The photographers' passion for their craft shone through in every image they captured.
